column4: is there a way to install ubuntu if i have a live cd and internet...the live cd i think is corrupted because the installation is not as smooth as the wubi
as the wubi on this computer
it installs fine, but it gets corrupted real fasgt
it will not save my settings....mouse and keyboard do not work on reboot....firefox crashes
when  i installed using wubi on this computer, everything works super
I have to reinstall after crashes
are you using a recent cd? I mean one since it was officially released?
does it happen after an update?
just type sea and hit the "tab" key to reply to me
i'd do a fschk,, may be a hardware issue, since u have windows then open "my computer" and right click on C drive and go to tools tab, do the disk error checking with both tabs checked..
why would u do that? what chipset you have for your wireless card?

when you use ndiswrapper and the "windows" drivers,, that means you do not want to use the drivers available to Linux, what is your wireless card? do this in a terminal to find:  sudo lshw -C network    the "C" is capital
its-  sudo lshw -C network    the "C" is capital
its called "tab-completion"   if you type seap and hit tab and it will either complete my nick or another's, hit tab again and it will go to the next, maybe mine
